title: The development/erection/re-erection/demolition or material alteration of the building …………………………
clause_text: The development/erection/re-erection/demolition or material alteration of the building ………………………….. on Plot No./C.S. No./C.T.S. No. …………………… of Division/village/Town Planning Scheme No. …………………………………. situated at Road/Street………………………………….ward……………………..will be carried out under my supervision. All the materials (type and grade) and the workmanship of the work will generally tally with the general specifications submitted along with the plans and the work will be carried out according to the sanctioned plans. I shall be responsible for the execution of the work in all respects. Signature of Licensed/ Surveyor/Engineer/ Structural Engineer/supervisor of Architect.
